column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////JUST OK. The food was alright but it's not worth the 1-2 hour wait. Also
column2: because of the continuous line up
column3: we felt rushed by our server to order but generally
column5: the owner of the restaurant was extremely rude. We had a group of 6 people and one of the members of our party has "mysteriously" gone missing (he was exploring the subway marketplace
column6: classic tourist). The owner said that all members of our party must be present before we were to be seated. This was fine
column7: but the way he said it and went about it was extremely rude.
